bug.summary: Issue import text data for ner
bug.description:
Describe the bug When I drag a .txt file on the import tasks box, I get the error: (I can load the tasks by clicking the import box and going through the uploader screens.) "Error: can't upload/process file on server side. Reasons: Critical error, see console for more description" The terminal says: "raise ValidationError('load_tasks: No data found in DATA or in FILES') label_studio.utils.exceptions.ValidationError: load_tasks: No data found in DATA or in FILES [2020-04-13 23:31:02,175] [werkzeug] [INFO] 127.0.0.1 - - [13/Apr/2020 23:31:02] "POST /api/import HTTP/1.1" 500 -" To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Go to 'import' tab. Drag and drop a text file See error
Expected behavior The file should load, and tasks should appear in the tasks.json file. Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: iOS Browser: Chrome and Brave Python Version: Python 3.6.2 I ran pip install label-studio to get the latest version
Additional context I can upload the document by clicking the upload box instead of dragging and dropping the file.
